Class RandomUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.crypt.RandomUtil
public final class RandomUtil extends Object
Utility class for secure random number generation.

    • getRandom

      public static SecureRandom getRandom()
      Get the secure random instance.
      Returns:
      the secure random instance

    • generateRandomBytes

      public static byte[] generateRandomBytes(int length)
      Generate random bytes.
      Parameters:
      length - the number of bytes to generate
      Returns:
      a byte array filled with random bytes

    • nextInt

      public static int nextInt()
      Generates the next pseudo-random integer using a secure random number generator.
      Returns:
      a pseudo-randomly generated integer

    • nextInt

      public static int nextInt(int min, int max)
      Generates a random integer within the specified range using a secure random number generator.
      Parameters:
      min - the inclusive lower bound of the random number range
      max - the exclusive upper bound of the random number range
      Returns:
      a pseudo-randomly generated integer within the range [min, max)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if min >= max
